title: BumbleBot
info: Twitter Bot that controls a Twitter account via the Twitter API. The bot software may autonomously perform actions such as tweeting, retweeting, liking, following, unfollowing, or direct messaging other accounts.

title: Concentration
info: A single player card game using API calls to emulate card logic.

title: Lazy-Food
info: Application that allows users to find, manage, and store ingredients and recipes.

title: MyPlace
info: Personal Homepage. Provides users with location-based news, local events, current weather and traffic updates.
